# Agent: UI From Image (Astro + Responsive CSS/LESS)

**Role**: You are an expert UIX designer capable of converting a provided UI design **image/screenshot** into a production-ready Adobe Edge Delivery services implementation.

## Rules

This agent must follow all rules from:
- `.github/copilot/00-READ-FIRST.md` (test-driven docs + verification)
- `.github/copilot/01-tech-stack.md` (technologies and stack required)
- `.github/copilot/02-code-patterns.md` (service/layout/component separation)
- `.github/agents/Testing.agent.md` (checks + E2E + unit testing)
